channel.title: Why Can't I Run Any HD Clients?
channel.description:
Hey all.
I been working on a 508 serve recently and have been trying to get an HD server!
But everytime I try to load an HD client, it says: error_game_js5io. And that happens on all off the HD clients I try to run.
Could someone please tell me how to fix this error? Any help is appreciated.
Thanks - Ags4lyfe

item.title: Why Can't I Run Any HD Clients?
item.dc:creator: @Ags4Lyfe Ags4Lyfe
item.description:
@Ags4Lyfe wrote:

We kinda got off the topic here…

Read full topic

item.title: Why Can't I Run Any HD Clients?
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

lildude783:

i do do that… lol i always have a bunch of bat files going… it doesnt really matter ? it just WONT LOAD UP!!! is there a certain way u have to download 508’s? or what???

the server needs to be hd compatible and also you need the cache in the right place.
go to tutorials there should be a tutorial on hd clients posted by tonypker13 or something

Read full topic

item.title: Why Can't I Run Any HD Clients?
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

[quote=“lildude783, post:15, topic:283345”]i have same problem? whenever i try to run a 508 client something weird happens and it keeps it at a white screen and doesnt work and it says some weird shit on the Run.Bat

hmm… maybe i should try to find out more about 508s?[/quote]
maybe also make sure u run the server before u start the client…i know the 317s u dont gotta do that…but for 508s the server must be up first

item.title: Why Can't I Run Any HD Clients?

item.description:

[quote=“Denoria, post:9, topic:283345”]It’s not reading your high detail cache, make sure it’s in C:/cache508 i think it is, and the right cache.
Hope i helped

Thanks,
Denoria.[/quote]

Thats what i said…

Hope i helped

Thanks,
Denoria.
